column4: hi, i have downloaded my windows 7 from msdnaa ( so its oryginal ) but i havent cdrom on my computer ( im writting from second a laptop ), on windows i could copy iso disk to pendrive and make him a disk boot partytion, how to do the same with a cd or iso file on ubuntu ?
use unetbootin for such, or use the Ubuntu's main website for the pendrive-installer-creator
